fields.label_info_text:
0: No response 
1: Grimaces 
2: Sneezes coughs/pulls away

0: Blue/Pale all over 
1: Blue/Pale extremities 
2: Normal all over

0: Absent 
1: Weak/Slow irregular breathing 
2: Good cry / RR40

fields.text:
APGAR score at 1 min, Abnormal: {apgar_score}/10. 
Go to emergency

fields.label_info_text:
0: No response 
1: Grimaces 
2: Sneezes coughs/pulls away

0: Blue/Pale all over 
1: Blue/Pale extremities 
2: Normal all over

0: Absent 
1: Weak/Slow irregular breathing 
2: Good cry / RR40

fields.text:
APGAR score at 5 mins, Abnormal: {apgar_score}/10. 
Go to emergency

v_min.err: Temperature must be equal or greater than 10

v_max.err: Temperature must be equal or less than 50

fields.text: Conduct relevant laboratory tests to elicit the cause of fever and manage according to standard guidelines
Manage the hypothermia according to standard guidelines

v_min.err: The weight must be equal or greater than 0 (KG)

v_max.err: The weight must be equal or less than 7 (KG)

fields.text: Manage according to SOP and National guideline
Manage according to SOP and National guideline

v_min.err: The heart rate must be equal or greater than 0 (bpm)

v_max.err: The heart rate must be equal or less than 200 (bpm)

fields.text: Manage according to SOP and National guideline

fields.label: Reasons for not Keeping the baby warm (skin to skin)

v_min.err: The breathing rate must be equal or greater than 0 (bpm)

v_max.err: The breathing rate must be equal or less than 80 (bpm)

fields.text: Manage according to SOP and National guideline
Manage according to SOP and National guideline

Reason as to why eye care was not given

fields.text: Provide BCG vaccine to the infant at the first Postnatal care visit or as soon as the BCG vaccine will be available. BCG should not be provided beyond 12-months of infant age

fields.hint: Reason as to why the BCG vaccine was not given

fields.text: Missed opportunity for OPV-0, provide OPV-1 at first postnatal care visit

fields.hint: Reason as to why the OPV 0 vaccine was not given

fields.text: Provide Hepatitis B vaccine to the infant at the first Postnatal care visit or as soon as the Hepatitis B vaccine will be available.

fields.hint: Reason as to why the Hepatitis B vaccine was not given

fields.text: Please provide AZT + 3TC and NVP Syrup
